targets.expr: redis_memory_used_bytes * on (instance) group_left redis_instance_info{ namespace = "$namespace", role="master"}
sum(redis_connected_clients{namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod) * on (pod) group_left redis_instance_info{ namespace = "$namespace", role="master"}
sum(rate(redis_commands_processed_total{namespace="$namespace"}[1m])) by (pod) * on (pod) group_left redis_instance_info{ namespace = "$namespace", role="master"}
sum(rate(redis_commands_duration_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace"}[1m])) by (pod) * on (pod) group_left redis_instance_info{ namespace = "$namespace", role="master"}
